mbean:
MPPS Emulator. Use to emulate the generation of MPPS messages for the defined AE titles. org.dcm4chex.archive.dcm.mppsscu.MPPSEmulatorService The default constructor MPPSEmulatorService AE titles of modalities for which MPPS messages shall be emulated. Multiple AE titles are separated by new line. For each AE title, a minimum delay time between the time the last object of the a study is received and the generation of the MPPS message can be explicit specified. If no delay is specified, a default delay of 5 minutes is used.
Format: aeTitle[:delay]
delay can be specified in seconds (##s) or minutes (##m).
Sample: MOD_MPPS:3m ModalityAETitles java.lang.String Interval for polling for newly received series from modalities you configured in the ModalityAETitles attribute. The interval can be specified in seconds (##s) or minutes (##m). NEVER = disable MPPS emulation. PollInterval java.lang.String AE title of the MPPS SCP, to which the emulated MPPS messages shall be sent. CalledAETitle java.lang.String Used internally. Do NOT modify. TimerIDCheckSeriesWithoutMPPS java.lang.String Used internally. Do NOT modify. MppsScuServiceName javax.management.ObjectName Used internally. Do NOT modify. SchedulerServiceName javax.management.ObjectName &defaultAttributes; &defaultOperations; Emulate MPPS messages for newly received series from the stations or modalities specified by the ModalityAETitles attribute. Returns the number of successfully created MPPS instances at the MPPS SCP that you specified with the CalledAETitle property. emulateMPPS int
